text: Zhenshi de qidao zhi guiyu ta, tamen she ta er qidao de (ouxiang), yidian ye buneng daying tamen de qiqiu. Dan tamen haoxiang yigeren, ba liang zhi shouzhang shen xiang shuizhong, yibian shui dadao ta de kou, qishi, shui jue bu hui dadao ta de kou de. Bu xindao zhe de qidao, zhi zai mi wu zhong.
